alert.note: Alert for Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:46AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Schleicher County through 1030 AM CDT... At 946 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of The Intersection Of Us- 190 And Ranch Road 1828, or 16 miles northwest of Eldorado, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eldorado, The Intersection Of Us-190 And Ranch Road 1828, Us- 190 Near The Crockett-Sutton County Line and Us-277 Near The Sutton- Schleicher County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
